trans-unit.source: Hosts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control in a cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> for editing strings.
The DataGridTextBoxColumn class derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
At run time, the DataGridTextBoxColumn hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control that allows users to edit text.
Special properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.
These properties allow you to access the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values.

If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> containing <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control.

The following data types are automatically associated with a DataGridTextBoxColumn : <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, and <xref:System.String>.

[Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, and <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
(Operators are not allowed.)
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.

To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.

To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
Use this constructor to create a custom format for the displayed data.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.

To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
The format used to format the column values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
Specifies whether the column is the default column.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.

To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
The format used.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is the default column.
Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.

This method rolls back any change made to the column and invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> methods.
The number of the row in which an edit operation is being interrupted.
Inititates a request to complete an editing procedure.
The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring.
If so, it formats the value appropriately.

If the value is `null`, the method enters <xref:System.Convert.DBNull> into the column; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> method to commit the value.
The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when an editing operation is committed.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
The number of the edited row.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value was successfully committed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Informs the column that the focus is being conceded.
In this overridden method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control hosted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> is hidden.
Prepares a cell for editing.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> sites a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited.
The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> method when an editing operation is about to begin.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
The row number in this column being edited.
The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the control is to be sited.
A value indicating whether the column is a read-only.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The text to display in the control.
A value indicating whether the cell is visible.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Ends an edit operation on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
To edit the value of a cell, call the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> before changing the value.
You must invoke the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method on both the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects before the change is committed.
Enters a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> in the column.
Enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> value into the cell.
Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.
The Format property specifies how values are displayed in the column.
For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format.
The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed.
For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type.
For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings.

You can change the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.

To set the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the application, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.
Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.

When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to one of the formatting characters, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> uses the information provided by the FormatInfo property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use.

For example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used.
To do this, create a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the FormatInfo property to the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
An object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface, such as the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
Gets the height of a cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
The value returned by GetMinimumHeight is calculated by adding the size of the column's font plus a margin value.
The height of a cell.
Gets the height to be used in for automatically resizing columns.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
The value to draw.
The height the cells automatically resize to.
Returns the optimum width and height of the cell in a specified row relative to the specified value.
The optimum width and height is calculated by measuring the string size, taking into account its font and attributes, and adding margin values.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
The value to draw.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the dimensions of the cell.
Hides the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> control and moves the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.

Paints the a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, and row number.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
The number of the row in the underlying data table.

Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, and alignment.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
The number of the row in the underlying data table.
A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>, and foreground color.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
The number of the row in the underlying data table.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that paints the background.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that paints the foreground color.
A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Draws the text and rectangle at the given location with the specified alignment.

The PaintText method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> object set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the PaintText method.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
The string to be drawn to the screen.
A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
Draws the text and rectangle at the specified location with the specified colors and alignment.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
The string to be drawn to the screen.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangle's background color
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangles foreground color.
A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that formats the values displayed in the column.
Sets a value indicating whether the text box column is read-only.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text box column is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Removes the reference that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> holds to the control used to edit data.
This method removes the reference that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> holds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control, in order to free system resources.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

When this methods is called, the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
This allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> to associate both controls with the same data source.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control is added to.
Gets the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control hosted by the column.
Updates the user interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> that supplies the data.
The index of the row to update.
The text that will be displayed in the cell.
